The flag is raised by the referee's assistant. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) is repeatedly being caught offside. He's always hanging on the shoulder of the last man to try and get into a scoring position.

Casemiro (Real Madrid) is obviously not following the Golden Rule: „Treat others as you want to be treated.“ He makes a bad challenge and leaves Inaki Vicandi Garrido with no other option than to blow for a foul.
